author: Eric Song
description: Powerful enough to run even the latest and most demanding games.
title: The Acer Predator Helios Neo Gaming Laptop with OLED Display and RTX 5070 Ti GPU Drops to $1,599.99

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Russo, meet Rambo. Anthony and Joe Russo’s AGBO will produce John Rambo, the upcoming prequel-reboot of the iconic action franchise that Noah Centineo (Black Adam, The Recruit) is in final negotiations to star in.
title: The Russo Brothers Will Executive Produce the New Rambo Movie Starring Noah Centineo

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Holy pizza, they're making an Overcooked reality TV show at last.
title: Oh My God They're Finally Making an Overcooked Reality TV Show

author: Eric Song
description: No spendy investment required to start printing out your own creations.
title: AliExpress Has 3D Printers Starting at $157 Ahead of Black Friday, Including Creality, Anycubic, Flashforge

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: KPop Demon Hunters is, unshockingly, getting a sequel. But it's going to take a bit of time to make, so you're not going to see it until 2029.
title: Don't Expect to See KPop Demon Hunters 2 Until 2029

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Miss Piggy is getting her own movie at last.
title: Miss Piggy Gets a New Movie From Jennifer Lawrence, Emma Stone, Cole Escola

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: Joining the Disney+ family.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Is Now Streaming

author: Christian Wait
description: As of Nov. 5, Pokémon TCG products are under market value, including the Mega Evolution Enhanced Booster Box and Team Rocket Tin. The Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World Bundle is down to $442, with Pro Controllers at $77. Plus, the Baseus 145W Power Bank is now just $40.59, $5 cheaper than yesterday.
title: Deals for Today: Pokémon TCG Under Market Value And Discounted Switch 2s

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Marvel adds a surprising new wrinkle to the saga of Kylo Ren, revealing that he reunited with Luke Skywalker following their fateful duel in The Last Jedi.
title: Star Wars Reveals Kylo Ren's Secret Reunion With Luke Skywalker After The Last Jedi

author: Eric Song
description: Apply coupon code SIXSEVEN.
title: The MSI GeForce RTX 5070 Graphics Card Is $100 Below MSRP, Now $450 Ahead of Black Friday

author: Eric Song
description: Black Friday worthy deals.
title: Official Xbox Wireless Controllers Are on Sale for as Low as $35 With Code SIXSEVEN

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Steam Deck has rolled out a much-wanted new feature that finally allows players to download games with the handheld PC system in low-power mode.
title: Steam Deck Finally Introduces New Quality-of-Life Feature Players Have Been Asking For

author: Christian Wait
description: s of Nov. 5, Amazon’s Pokémon TCG White Flare Booster Bundle is available at market value for $51.35 — roughly $8.56 per pack. Plus, Team Rocket Tins are under market value and packed with Destined Rivals and Journey Together boosters. Here’s where to buy the best chase cards from White Flare and Black Bolt right now.
title: Pokémon TCG: White Flare Booster Bundle Now At Market Value on Amazon

author: Luke Reilly
title: V for Vendetta Will Return to Cinemas for its 20th Anniversary in 2026

author: Michael Cripe
description: EA and Battlefield Studios have plans to tweak aim assist settings for Battlefield 6 controller users – but that hasn’t stopped PC players from digging into the files to turn off crossplay.
title: Battlefield 6 Devs to 'Revert' Aim Assist Settings as PC Players Edit Files to Turn Off Crossplay

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: New Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection amiibo - a Ratha V, Rudy, and Ratha - are available to preorder at GameStop, releasing March 13.
title: Some Very Fun Monster Hunter Stories 3 Amiibo Are Up for Preorder at GameStop

author: Chris Reed
description: The Old King’s Crown is a grab bag of concepts from all sorts of other board games, each given a loving polish and shape to fit it into a greater whole, wrapped in the most amazing eye candy, creating a unique package.
title: The Old King’s Crown Board Game Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel star Brie Larson cast her vote in yesterday's elections while covering her hair and telling fans they should absolutely, definitely "ignore the wig!!" she was wearing. Which, of course, has led the internet to do exactly the opposite.
title: 'Ignore the Wig!!' Brie Larson Sparks Avengers: Doomsday Speculation After Hiding Hair in Voting Booth Photo

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: While we’re still waiting for Disney and Epic Games’ connected universe to arrive in Fortnite, a big step has been taken towards that goal as Disney Parks has arrived in Fortnite for the first time with Disneyland Game Rush. We had the chance to try out this Fortnite Creative island and discovered it to be an incredibly authentic experience that celebrates Disneyland’s 70th anniversary through enjoyable yet forgettable mini-games and environments inspired by beloved attractions such as Haunted Mansion, Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance, and more.
title: Fortnite’s Disneyland Game Rush Is an Incredibly Authentic First Step Into Fortnite For Disney Parks

author: Scott Collura
description: Dante's Inferno 2 was cancelled over a decade ago, but IGN can now reveal the full story of the unmade, Purgatory-set sequel.
title: Inside Dante’s Purgatorio, the Cancelled Sequel to EA’s Dante’s Inferno

author: Vikki Blake
description: Terminator 2D: No Fate — the new retro game that blends scenes from Terminator 2: Judgment Day with original scenarios and multiple endings — has been delayed for a third time, this time to December 12, 2025.
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate Delayed Again, This Time to December As Team Needs Time To Assemble Physical Editions

author: Tom Phillips
description: A "Cross-Buy" graphic spotted on the PlayStation Store has sparked speculation that Sony is set to announce cross-platform purchasing for its games across consoles and PC.
title: PlayStation 5 Cross-Buy Graphic Spotted, Sparking Hope That Sony Will Finally Introduce Dual PS5 And PC Purchases

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Chicken Chicken is a new eight-player online multiplayer party game for PC and mobile (and later, consoles) from the makers of Kiborg in which everyone plays, as the name implies, as a chicken. You'll compete against your friends in racing cars, climbing mountains, catching flies, and more. A playable demo is now available on Steam.
title: Chicken Chicken Is an 8-Player Party Game Where Everyone Is a Literal Chicken

author: Tom Phillips
description: Hot on the heels of Nintendo's handheld success with Switch 2, Sony is ramping up the capabilities of its own PlayStation Portal device with the ability to stream thousands of games without being connected to a PS5 console.
title: Sony Ramps Up PlayStation Portal Capabilities With Cloud Streaming

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Battlefield 6 developer BF Studios has announced a “major” overhaul of Challenges and Assignments, with “substantial” adjustments across the board.
title: Battlefield 6 Gets 'Major' Overhaul of Challenges and Assignments, With 'Significant' Reductions to Challenge Requirements Available Now

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Witcher Season 4 looks like it’s having a hard time compared to previous seasons of the Netflix series, with viewership data showing a dramatic decline.
title: The Witcher Season 4 Suffers Dramatic Drop in Viewership Compared to Previous Seasons

author: Matt Fowler
description: Christy Review: Sydney Sweeney blazes trails and pulls no punches in a choppy biopic that falters at the finish.
title: Christy Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo plans to release further video game films at a "consistent" rate following the launch of next year's The Super Mario Galaxy Movie and 2027's The Legend of Zelda.
title: Nintendo Planning 'Consistent Release Cadence' For More Video Game Movies, Following Super Mario Galaxy and The Legend of Zelda Films

author: Vikki Blake
description: Today, November 5, marks 10 years to the day Battlestate Games unveiled its extraction shooter, Escape from Tarkov. And now, 10 days from its 1.0 release, the developer has revealed preorder and beta rewards.
title: Escape From Tarkov Shares Preorder and Beta Rewards as It Nears 1.0 Launch

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Obsidian has said it’s well aware that whenever it announces a new game, people ask where Fallout: New Vegas 2 is, but it loves how it’s been able to create new IP and even release sequels to them — and its owner Microsoft sounds like it supports that approach.
title: Obsidian Knows Whenever It Announces a New Game Everyone Asks About Fallout: New Vegas 2, but It Loves Making Original IP and Sequels to Them

author: Tom Phillips
description: Ever wondered exactly how many hours you ploughed into Donkey Kong Bananza on a specific day this summer? The new Nintendo Store app will let you find out.
title: Nintendo Store App Lets You Track Your Switch, 3DS And Even Wii U Gameplay Down to The Hour

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Valor Mortis, the first-person action game set in an alt-history version of the Napoleonic wars, was announced earlier this year at Gamescom Opening Night Live. In its announcement and subsequent marketing, the developers have been clear about one big element of Valor Mortis: it’s a soulslike.
title: Valor Mortis Dev Dares Fans to Question the Game's Soulslike Credentials: 'If You Are Not Sure About It, Challenge Us'

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Valor Mortis, the first-person soulslike action game set in an alt-history Napoleonic era, is out next year. And with developer One More Level especially pushing the “soulslike”-ness of the whole thing, it seems only natural that at some point before or after launch there’s going to be a discussion about the game’s difficulty.
title: 'What Connects Soulslike Players Is That They Are All Struggling' — Valor Mortis Dev Says It Won't Have 'Tens of Difficulty Options' So Players Can Have 'Similar Experiences'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Epic Games has celebrated the launch of Fortnite's new The Simpsons mini-season, which it says has welcomed "the biggest number of new and returning Fortnite players since last holiday season."
title: Epic Games Celebrates Fortnite Player Spike as The Simpsons Season Launches

author: Vikki Blake
description: Activision has confirmed the Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 global release times and PC specs. Here's when you'll be able to play in your timezone.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Global Release Times and PC Specs Confirmed

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: In a new interview, director Dan Trachtenberg tells IGN he's well aware Predator purists may criticize Predator: Badlands, but has insists "retreading and remaking the same thing over and over" risks upsetting everyone.
title: Dan Trachtenberg Tells IGN He's Well Aware Predator Purists May Criticize Predator: Badlands, but Insists 'Retreading and Remaking the Same Thing Over and Over' Risks Upsetting Everyone

author: Tom Phillips
description: A day after revealing its latest stellar sales figures, Nintendo has confirmed it will now "shift" its development focus to Switch 2 — and revealed that 84% of the console's early adoptees were players who owned Switch 1.
title: Nintendo Signals Primary Development Focus 'Shift' to Switch 2, as Switch 1 Owners 'Uniformly Migrating'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Bethesda has outlined the patch notes for Fallout 4 ahead of the release of the Creations Menu update and Anniversary Edition.
title: Bethesda Issues Fallout 4 Mod Warning Ahead of Anniversary Edition Release, Patch Will Make Gameplay and Performance Improvements as Well as Add New Creations Menu

author: Luke Reilly
description: Overflowing with ambition but ultimately plain and with no style to call its own, Wreckreation feels like a supermarket brand homage to a series of better arcade racers.
title: Wreckreation Review

author: Eric Song
description: Certified refurbished model from the official Meta Store with 2 year extended warranty.
title: The Meta Quest 3S VR Headset Drops to Just $215.99 Ahead of Black Friday

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: It's time to ditch your coffee table or dining table and up your game with a proper puzzle table!
title: The Best Puzzle Tables and Boards for the Ultimate Puzzle Station
